tuv.seg: ###第一章 重生成为团宠
Chapter 1: Reborn As The Apple Of Everyone's Eyes
“大哥二哥三哥，你们不用担心，我没事。”叶漓瓮声瓮气的道。
"Big Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, don't worry, I'm alright," Ye Li said in a hoarse voice.
“小妹，以后万不可再做这样的傻事了知道吗？哥哥们知道你喜欢于向阳，以后再也不会逼你嫁给徐凤年了。”另一个长相十分斯文，看起来书生气息颇浓的男人无奈又心疼的劝道。

"Little sister, don't ever do such a foolish thing, alright? We, your brothers, know that you fancy Yu Xiangyang and we'll never force you to marry Xu Fengnian again," said another scholarly-looking man who seemed mild-mannered. He felt helpless and took pity on his younger sister.
“我是死了吗？不然为什么会见到哥哥他们？”她瞪着美目，不可置信的喃喃。
"Am I dead? Otherwise, how can I see my brothers?" Her beautiful eyes were wide open and she was muttering in disbelief.
“是啊阿漓宝贝，你吓死哥哥了，你要是出了一点事，要哥哥们日后怎么办呀。”蓝发男同样是一脸伤心。
"Yeah, Baby Li, you scared us. If anything happens to you, what are we supposed to do in the future?" the man with the blue hair said, looking just as sad as the others.
“阿漓，你到底怎么了？哪里不舒服告诉哥哥们好吗？”
"Li, what's wrong with you? If you're feeling unwell, tell us, okay?"
“阿漓，你终于醒了！”
"Li, you've finally come to!"
三个男人看着她脸上翻腾的喜色，着实是觉得怪异。
The three men found her joyous expression to be extremely bizarre.
三个阴沉着一张脸站着的男人在看到女孩初醒的瞬间，一下围了上去，表情如出一辙的担忧。
Three men with somber expressions immediately crowded the girl immediately after they saw her regaining consciousness. They all looked extremely worried.
三人闻言，惊愕的看她。
The three men looked at her in shock after hearing their words.
上辈子她最恨三位哥哥和爸爸，觉得是他们非要逼着自己嫁给徐凤年，毁了自己一辈子的幸福，所以一直对他们怀恨在心。
In her previous life, she hated her three brothers and father the most for forcing her to marry Xu Fengnian and thus ruining her lifelong happiness. Hence, she had always born a grudge against them.
下一秒，她的眼睛猛地睁开，扩散的瞳孔在一瞬间收缩，脸上还带着愤怒和惊恐绝望。
In the next second, she opened her eyes abruptly and her dilated pupils constricted immediately while infuriation, panic, and despair were written all over her face.
世界上最完美的三个男人，都是她的哥哥，最疼她最宠她，可上辈子的自己却恨了他们半辈子。
The three most perfect men in the world were all her brothers, who loved and pampered her the most. However, in her previous life, she hated them for half a lifetime.
他成熟又完美，是年轻一代的佼佼者，可就是这样的男人，却是一个妹控！
He was mature and perfect, and a leader of the younger generation. However, a powerful man like him actually doted on his younger sister greatly!
再看看周围的粉红色的豪华装饰的房间，她愣住了。
Looking around at the luxuriously decorated room that had pink as its theme color, she was dumbfounded.
几个像是老婆子般一直劝导的男人闻声一下就闭了嘴，疑惑的对视一眼，便道：“你这丫头，傻了不成，2020年5月23号啊。”

The men, who had been persuading her like old long-winded women, immediately fell silent after hearing her words. They looked at each other in bewilderment before saying, "Silly girl, it's the 23rd of May, 2020."
几人愣住，随后对视一眼，都从对方眼中看到了相同的担忧之色，戴着眼镜穿着白衬衫十分精明的男人严肃的开口：“你这是说什么傻话，你怎么可能会死呢？”

The few men were stunned, after which they looked at each other and saw the looks of worry in one another's eyes. The smart man who was wearing glasses and a white shirt chastised sternly, "What silly things are you saying? How can you be dead?"
到了最后才明白，年纪轻轻就出了意外的哥哥们，才是真正关心她的人。
She only realized in the end that her brothers who had gotten into an accident at a young age, were the ones who really cared about her.
只恨自己瞎了眼，一心只相信叶眉和于向阳这对渣男贱女的话，以至于最后被害到了那样的下场！
She could only blame herself for being blind and believing Yu Xiangyang and Ye Mei, the despicable couple who caused her to end up in that terrible situation!
可二十岁之后，家中的人因为已故母亲当初同好姐妹徐家大夫人曾定下的娃娃亲，非要让她同那个冷冰冰的男人订婚，彼时，叶漓已近有了心仪之人，又怎会愿意。

After Ye Li reached the age of twenty, her family insisted that she marry the cold and unfeeling man from the Xu Family, because her late mother had betrothed her to the son of her best friend, the matriarch of the Xu Family, ever since they were children. However, Ye Li was already in love with someone else. How could she have agreed to it?
可到了最后才知道，原来自己最讨厌的人，才是真正宠她入骨的。
However, she only found out in the end that the people whom she hated the most were actually the ones who truly spoiled her to bits.
可这件事距离此时已近过去了八年，又怎会再现？
However, it had been eight years since that incident occurred. Why did this scene appear again?
可这对他们来说，却更为反常，不由的担忧对视一眼，作为大哥的叶洛先开了口，“阿漓，让你和徐凤年订婚是我们的不对，以后万不可再做傻事了好不好？”

However, to them, they felt that she was acting out of the ordinary. They couldn't help but look at each other worriedly. The eldest brother, Ye Luo, was the first to speak. "Li, it was wrong of us to make you get engaged to Xu Fengnian back then. Don't do anything stupid in the future again, alright?"
可这幅怪异的表情落到三人眼中，又是一阵疑惑。
However, the three men were confused again when they saw her peculiar expression.
可那样太奇怪了，重生也太奇怪了，她必须得忍住，直到确定一切都是真实存在为止。
However, that was too strange, just like her rebirth. She had to hang on until she was certain that everything was real.
叶漓心中无比悔恨和愧疚。
Ye Li's heart was filled with regret and guilt.
叶漓愣怔了一会，突然反应过来，不对，哥哥们看起来怎么好像是年轻了好多岁？
After being stunned for a while, Ye Li suddenly recovered from the shock and thought, 'Something is wrong. Why do my brothers all look so much younger?'
叶漓狠狠的掐了自己大腿一下，剧烈的刺痛却让她莫名的欣喜若狂。
Ye Li pinched her thigh forcefully and the sharp, excruciating pain made her feel somewhat ecstatic and elated.
叶漓的三哥叫做叶枫，这会儿还穿着帝都大学的校服，他染着一头蓝发，整个人看起来吊儿郎当的，可却是如今帝都大学的校草兼学霸，娱乐圈的当红一线大明星，全国女人心尖上的男神！可他依然还是一个妹控！

Ye Li's third brother was named Ye Feng. He was still wearing the uniform of Beijing University and he had a head full of blue hair. He seemed nonchalant and sloven but he was the most handsome boy in school and the star student of Beijing University. He was also a famous A-list celebrity in the showbiz industry, and the idol of all women in the nation! Yet, he was also particularly indulgent towards his younger sister!
叶漓的心一疼。
Ye Li's heart ached.
叶漓看向三位有几分相似却同样帅气俊美的哥哥。
Ye Li looked at her three brothers who somewhat resembled each other but were equally handsome and suave.
叶漓睁开的眼睛，就对上了三张帅气到令人尖叫的俊脸。
As soon as Ye Li opened her eyes, she was greeted with three handsome and swoon-worthy faces.
因为联姻一事，她可谓是恨极了他们。
She detested them to the core because of the arranged marriage that she had been forced into.
夜幕。
It was nighttime.
她不顾几个男人的担忧，急忙问：“哥，今天是什么几年几月？”
Ignoring the fact that they were worried, she anxiously asked, "Brother, what's the date today?"
她怕自己稍微大声一点，就会忍不住大哭出声。
She was afraid that she would burst into tears uncontrollably if she were to speak any louder.
她清楚的记得，自己被叶眉关在那个私人医院的时候，已是2028年。
She clearly remembered that it was the year 2028 when Ye Mei locked her up in that private hospital.
她的心脏狂跳了两下，这样熟悉的感觉，自己真的死了？
Her heart pounded vigorously twice. 'What a familiar feeling. Am I really dead?'
她自小怕水，这会儿竟然能为了这事能做到这一步，三人心里又是恨自己不该这么逼她，又是气她为何这么冲动。

Ever since she was a child, she had been afraid of water. Yet, she actually took things so far because of that matter. The three men blamed themselves for forcing her and were also angry at her for being so impulsive.
寂静的房间中，隐约听到了女人微弱的呼吸声。
In the quiet room, the faint sounds of a woman breathing faintly could be heard.
对于自家小妹不愿意同徐家定亲还想不开自杀一事，三个男人都十分的愤怒。
The three men were furious that their little sister had tried to take her own life because she was unwilling to accept her marriage with the Xu Family.
帝都中心繁星庄园。
In Starry Manor in Beijing.
恐是没想到这辈子还能听到叶漓这一声哥哥。
They probably did not expect to hear Ye Li calling them her brothers again in their lifetime.
想到这个可能，叶漓整个人都陷入了一阵震惊当中。
At the thought of this possibility, Ye Li was flabbergasted.
戴着眼镜穿着白衬衫的看起来十分斯文的是叶漓的二哥，叶旬，二十四岁，帝都第一大学的老师，史上最年轻的天才教授,但这样一个优秀的男人，他也是个妹控。

The scholarly-looking, bespectacled man who was wearing a white shirt, was Ye Li's second brother, Ye Xun, a twenty-four-year-old professor of Beijing University. He was the youngest ingenious professor in history. However, an outstanding man like him also doted on his younger sister greatly.
所以说，自己重生回到了八年前？
'Does this mean that I've been reborn in the year 2020?'
按照平时，这丫头看到他们，不应该是大吵大闹的叫滚？
Ye Li would usually throw a huge tantrum and tell them to get lost whenever she saw them.
是那么的熟悉，她一下就惊在了原地。
Their faces were so familiar that she immediately froze on the spot.
有什么事情不能好好说吗？
They felt that she could have talked things out with them properly.
果然！
Just as she expected!
灯光打在床上的人儿上，只见她双眼紧闭，满头大汗，仿佛正在经历什么难以言喻的痛苦。
The light was cast on the person who was lying on the bed with her eyes closed, sweating profusely like she was experiencing some inexplicable agony.
穿着一身西装的是大哥叶洛，不过二十六岁，如今却已近叶氏集团的副总裁，下一任的叶家继承人。
Her eldest brother, Ye Luo, who was wearing a suit, had already become the Deputy CEO of the Ye Corporation even though he was only twenty-six years old. He was the next successor of the Ye Family.
而她叶漓，叶家大小姐，二十岁之前，一直是上天的宠儿。
On the other hand, Ye Li, the heiress of the Ye Family, was truly Heaven's favorite before she turned twenty.
腿上的疼痛不似作假，哥哥们的担忧又是那般清晰可见。
The pain in her legs felt real and her brothers were clearly worried about her too.
自己二十三岁就嫁给了徐凤年，之后就再也没有回过家了。
She had married Xu Fengnian at the age of twenty-three and ever since then, she had never returned home.
若不是之后叶眉得逞之后，将所有一切同她炫耀，她恐是这辈子也无法知道真相。
Had Ye Mei not shown off everything to her after getting her way, she would have never known the truth in her lifetime.
要说叶家，如今也是帝都第一世家，同徐家在这座昌荣繁华的城市并列第一的两大超级世家。
The Ye Family was now the top family in Beijing, alongside the Xu Family, the two being the most powerful families in this prosperous and bustling city.
这个房间她从小睡到大，记忆深刻，但是在自家被叶眉那个无耻女人剥夺之后，这个房间就已经从此消失，如今又怎么会出现。

The room, which she had slept in since she was a child, was deeply etched in her memory. However, it disappeared after the shameless woman Ye Mei appeared and snatched away her family. Since then, this room disappeared as well. Why did it appear again today?
这件事叶漓记得很清楚。
Ye Li remembered that incident very clearly.
难..难不成自己重生了？
'Did... did I get reborn?'
面对曾经疼爱自己的父亲和哥哥们的各种相逼，同学们的嘲笑，性格极端的她直接跳了学校的池塘，险些淹死。

Faced with all kinds of pressure from her father and brothers, who used to love and dote on her very much, as well as the mockery of her classmates, Ye Li, who had an extreme personality, jumped straight into the pond in school where she almost drowned.
